description:
The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a
randomly generated action RPG
shooter with heavy Rogue-like
elements. On his journey, Isaac will
find bizarre treasures, face droves of
strange creatures, discover secrets,
and fight his way to safety. This is the
ultimate of remakes with an all-new
highly efficient game engine, new pixel
style artwork, polished visual effects,
all-new soundtrack, and hundreds of
new designs, redesigns and
enhancements.
name: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
